flavor_text: CASTFORM's appearance changes with the weather. This Pokemon gained the ability to usethe vast power of nature to protect its tiny body.
CASTFORM borrows the power of nature to transform itself into the guises of the sun rain clouds and snow clouds.This Pokemon's feelings change with the weather.
It alters its form depending on the weather. Changes in the climate such as the temperature and humidity appear to affect its cellular structure.
It has the ability to change its form into the sun the rain or a snow cloud depending on the weather.
